document.full_text: marketing messages have led consumers to believe menthol cigarettes may offer health benefits over regular ones, u.s. government advisers said in a draft report released on thursday.
document.title: u.s. advisers: consumers see menthol health benefits
lines_and_colors: marketing messages have led consumers to believe menthol cigarettes may offer health benefits over regular ones, u.s. government advisers said in a draft report released on thursday.
